main.java.sort

Class MergeSort

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.sort.Sort
      • main.java.sort.MergeSort

  • public class MergeSort
extends main.java.sort.Sort
    An algorithm with order NlogN complexity. Although this algorithm is very efficient, there is a tradeoff of memory allocation, due to breaking up an array of size N in half log_2(N) times.
    Author:
    Matthew E. Coupal

      • merge

        private int[] merge(int[] left,
          int[] right,
          int[] list)
        Merges two given arrays into a single, specified array.
        Parameters:
        left - The left array.
        right - The right array.
        list - The single array to be merged into.
        Returns:
        The list, with each index derived from the left and right arrays.
